alert.note: Alert for Deaf Smith; Oldham (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued July 05 at 9:54PM CDT until July 05 at 11:00PM CDT by NWS Amarillo
info.description: The National Weather Service in Amarillo has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Oldham County in the Panhandle of Texas... Northeastern Deaf Smith County in the Panhandle of Texas... * Until 1100 PM CDT. * At 954 PM CDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from 13 miles southwest of Channing to 12 miles northwest of Vega to 3 miles northwest of Adrian, moving southeast at 30 mph. HAZARD...70 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect some tree damage. Damage is likely to mobile homes, roofs, and outbuildings. Hail damage to vehicles is expected. * Locations impacted include... Vega, Adrian, Boys Ranch and Wildorado. THUNDERSTORM DAMAGE THREAT...CONSIDERABLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...70 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
